root.name: Back to Skool
root.description: Back to Skool is the sequel to Skool Daze and this time has you as the younger brother of the hero from the first game. Similar to that game you must find a way to break in to the head masters safe before the end of term so you can steal you bad report card. This time round there are the boys school and the next door girls school as well as the attending classes, fights, catapults and general mischief of the first game.
